    • handleMessage

      public void handleMessage​(TimeOutServer message)
      If the player has lost connection, it shows how many reconnection tests the server is running if the player is not someone who already lost.
      Specified by:
      handleMessage in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      message - a TimeOutServer.

    • handleMessage

      public void handleMessage​(ReConnectionServer message)
      If one of the players in the current lobby has the same name as the one trying to reconnect, the server re-add this player in the match, giving the client the information about the game before he left. It also informs the others that the player has successfully returned. If the player refuse to continue to play in the past lobby, he's then redirected to a new current lobby (the old one will be deleted).
      Specified by:
      handleMessage in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      message - a ReConnectionServer.

    • handleMessage

      public void handleMessage​(EasterEggServer easterEggServer)
      Why don't u find out? ;)
      Specified by:
      handleMessage in interface ViewInterface

      public void endMatch()
      Print a question if the player lose or win, asking what to do next (create a new lobby or close the game while still refreshing the board).

      public void printTable()

    • printPlayers

      public java.lang.String[] printPlayers​(java.lang.String[] print)

      Returns:
      the printed text.
